TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: Manley - A KSP Movie

Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_mztxfh3Juj1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/GJvtKCgOnFg" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Hullo there! The ever-brilliant Nassault is back with a tale of discovery for all Kerbalkind. In the quest for Kerbal intelligence, one brave soul - Manley Kerman -* undergoes a mission that takes them into uncharted territory when things take an unexpected turn. We don’t want to spoil it, but you definitely should watch this all the way through!</p>

This video triggers a lot of nostalgia for me. Very well done! . I absolutely loved the trippy tunnel effects from the 2010. Now someone needs to remake the scene from 2001 Space odyssey, where the ape man throws up a bone that fast forwards into a space craft...
These people with their awesome KSP cinematics.....
I went into this expecting Scott Manley, and oddly enough, I wasn't too far off-base!
Nassault has a way of making things just suspenseful to keep you watching, but not so much that you skip bits of the video. AWESOME!!!

I went into this expecting Scott Manley, and oddly enough, I wasn't too far off-base!

i thought the same when i saw it on youtube the other day

i thought the same when i saw it on youtube the other day

I think that was the artist's point of the title, folks.
